name: Heading East
description:
You receive a text from your friend Jane in the middle of the night - as usual. Wanna hang out? She is leaving soon after all...

This game entered "ShuffleComp: Disc 2", and was inspired by the atmosphere of the song "Vacant Night Sky" by Vancouver band Mecca Normal. Cover art is "The Bridge .. Vancouver" by Nick Kenrick (zedzap on Flickr).
